ai-patthana23.28:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.28:0.3_0: those who practice it leads to the appointment.
ai-patthana23.28:1.1_0: it’s not due to undertaking unskillful things that give rise to skillful qualities, that is skillful and unskillful, with a reason.
ai-patthana23.28:2.1_0: it’s not due to accumulation, go towards the teaching, and an unskillful quality that gives rise to unskillful qualities.
ai-patthana23.28:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.28:3.1_2: the five hindrances are not clear.
